description: This plugin brings to Bubble the WaveApps GraphQL API. WaveApps is a free accounting platform that is great for individuals, small businesses, and start-ups. Disclaimer: I do not work for WaveApps nor was this plugin sanctioned by them.
name: WaveApps API
plugin_instructions:
1. Create a WaveApps account. 
2. Sign-in to your WaveApps account.
3. Create a new developer application at https://developer-apps.waveapps.com/apps/
4. Create a full access token in the application you created from step 3.
5. Use the full access token in your API calls. Hint: make sure to leave the "Bearer" prefix when adding the token.
